quote: All I'm saying is that you shouldn't stay with him for the wrong reasons, even if they are noble ones. No one owes it to someone else to be their girlfriend. It's a choice you remake every day.
quote_letters: ALL IM SAYING IS THAT YOU SHOULDNT STAY WITH HIM FOR THE WRONG REASONS EVEN IF THEY ARE NOBLE ONES NO ONE OWES IT TO SOMEONE ELSE TO BE THEIR GIRLFRIEND ITS A CHOICE YOU REMAKE EVERY DAY
